scripts.build:happ: npm run build:happ -w example && npm run build:happ:clone -w example
scripts.build:libs: npm run build -w packages/cell-proxy && npm run build -w packages/lit-happ
scripts.devtest: npm run build:happ && npm run build:libs && npm run build -w example && npm run start
scripts.devtest:clone: npm run build:happ && npm run build:libs && npm run build -w example && npm run start:clone
scripts.publish:cell: npm run build -w packages/cell-proxy && cd packages/cell-proxy && npm publish
scripts.publish:lit: npm run build -w packages/lit-happ && cd packages/lit-happ && npm publish
scripts.publish:we: npm run build -w packages/we-utils && cd packages/we-utils && npm publish
scripts.publish:all: npm publish:cell && npm publish:lit && npm publish:we
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:hc & npm run clean:npm & npm run clean
